description: Numbers n such that n | sigma_12(n).
comments: sigma_12(n) is the sum of the 12th powers of the divisors of n (A013960).
maple: with(numtheory);A055716:=proc(q)local a,i,n;for n from 1 to q do  a:=divisors(n); if frac(add(a[i]^12,i=1..nops(a))/n)=0 then print(n);fi; od; end:A055716(100000);  # _Paolo P. Lava_, Dec 07 2012
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Jun 09 2000
